page.title: 06Local News Events.
page.content: In our{Local newspapers,The Kent and {Sussex Courier Sussex_Express and the {Friday_Ad,}we found very few things about our D_block.There were {advertisements}for cars and workers at Maresfield Garage. There was a{garden {fete}at Five Ash Down.We looked for things in the{Maresfield Parish {Magazine}.There was a flower arrangement competition.A craft exhibition.A Friendly Club Blossom Drive.A Sponsored bicycle ride and a Greater than God service.Other events were a camp fire,a lunch club for mums and young children,a coffee morning in aid of the church roof fund.And a Church Gift Day.We found out that last Tuesday a{Gipsy Caravan caught fire and was destroyed at Maresfield travellers camp. by Kerry and Natasha.
